lore: When the Hellion gangs ride their bladed skyboards alongside Drukhari raiding parties, they bring terror to the battlefields of realspace. Arrogant and agile, Hellions wield their hellglaives with such skill that battle becomes a contest as to who can perform the most ostentatious acts of battlefield butchery.

faction: Hit and Run: This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
